meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>woman</radical> sees the <radical>Mona Lisa</radical>, she feels a strong feeling of <kanji>dislike</kanji>. All women dislike the Mona Lisa because of how much attention she gets.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>dislike</kanji> the Mona Lisa so much you hire <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai to cut her up.
